text:
Abine - the online privacy company | REMOTE or BOSTON, MA | PART Time or Full Time | Web application and Full Stack Developers | https://www.abine.com/

We are a small company focused on making better online privacy easy.

From Tim Cook to Facebook to global Government, online privacy is (finally) becoming a critical issue in tech. Want to be on the front lines?

We make two products. Blur is a password manager with support for creating alias email addresses, phone numbers, and credit card numbers. DeleteMe is a service for removing private information from data broker sites.

We're looking for strong web application and full-stack developers who are interested in making a difference in the fight for privacy. We are profitable, have been doing this for years, and have a strong and growing customer base.

Please contact us at jobs at getabine dotcom. (no recruiters)
